title: Death Recap
body: Can riot either fix death recap or get rid of it cause its pretty useless as it is right now.

replies.body: ARAM death recap has been useless for what feels like years now, what the hell? why? Fix it please, Jesus. seems like it would be something on the top of the list, yet, even 3v3s aren't stable or have ranked in OCE, it feels like they could fix it in a heart beat if they gave a ****. which makes me feel like they seriously don't give a **** about us, because it's not where the $$$ is at.

Yeah Riot won't fix it, but there is a 3rd party app that has a good and correct death recap and my guess is it will be like the Curse voice thing and the Dragon/Buff timers.

Riot will shut down the program then incorporate a piece of it into their own client side programming, then say there app is allowed again.

yeah death recap is super bugged right now, it needs to be re-released with more detail + damage from up to 5 champs
hate taking 3k+ damage only to have the death recap be leblanc basic attack 59 + minions 250 damage and thats it
